amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the nuclear force improvement program of the Air Force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1485 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1485 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hoeven to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1485 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1485 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hoeven to Amendment SA 1463.
